response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted with exceptional quality. This product not only stands as a testament to innovation but also offers unparalleled functionality and durability. Given its unique features and the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation, we believe it's worth more than just its face value. Considering all these aspects, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to own a piece that combines excellence and value, tailored specifically for discerning individuals like yourself. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 15000}
